title: Massive Black Hole
description: Second Edition - 2016How far will they go to get what they want? A meeting of chance brings three young women together and they begin an unlikely friendship that will alter the course of their lives forever. Hell, like you've never imagined it before.A thought-provoking psychological thriller, "Massive Black Hole gives the reader lots to think about." - Jack Magnus for Readers' Favorite
author: Andrea Barbosa
